title: MTGGoldfish

Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast

Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Simic Spellslinger Siege Mill  12 Rare Budget Magic
videos.description:
Can Glacerwood Siege power a spellslinger-style mill deck in Standard, all on just a $90 / 12-rare budget? Let's find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/budget-magic-12-rare-simic-spellslinger-siege-mill-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7104193#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/DnWEx
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/M7Oi4
